name: Onionmail
tagline: TOR Mail encrypted server for Hidden Services
body:
OnionMail README v.2
  https://github.com/aaa115/onionmail/wiki		
  announced at: http://ev3h5yxkjz4hin75.onion.link/wiki/index.php/Email_/_Messaging
  ################################################
  #  WEB:       http://onionmail.info            #
  #  TOR:       http://louhlbgyupgktsw7.onion    #
  ################################################
    
OnionMail is an open source SMTP/POP3 compatible mail server with some functions 
designed for Tor hidden services. OnionMail uses filesystem cryptography and some 
extended functions. This server allows you to use the e-mail in the tor 
network without losing the ability to e-mail in clearnet.

http://onionmail.info/manual.html 


The root directory of project is:
	/mnt/sdcard/ONM/
	Change that setting in etc/onionmail/config.conf
	
Version 2 is upcoming.
This repository is updated automatically from the internal repository development of OnionMail. 
The this repository is updated in weekly cycles (sometimes). If you want to contribute to the development of the project contact us to have access to trusted internal repository.

partecipa@onionmail.info
or
tramacio@ridotnp5m5lp22gw.onion
tramacio@onionmail.info
	

http://onionmail.info/developer.html

https://github.com/aaa115/onionmail/wiki
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
